alert.note: Alert for Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills; Northern Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 7:19PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTH CENTRAL CLACKAMAS AND SOUTH CENTRAL MARION COUNTIES THROUGH 745 PM PDT... At 719 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northeast of Mill City, or 14 miles northwest of Detroit, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Elkhorn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills; Northern Oregon Cascades
